content.raw:
Hi @PK94 , Yes closed loops are possible in SDF. Here is an example: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/default/test/worlds/free_loop.world

I would say these types of questions are better asked on http://answers.gazebosim.org/questions/ since there are more people there who read them, but I'm not sure if that applies since you're not using Gazebo. I don't know why pybullet is crashing,  but since this is the sdformat repo I'll close this assuming the question is answered.

Hi @PK94 , Yes closed loops are possible in SDF. Here is an example: https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/default/test/worlds/free_loop.world

I would say these types of questions are better asked on http://answers.gazebosim.org/questions/ since there are more people there who read them, but I'm not sure if that applies since you're not using Gazebo.
